item.title: Non-Postal
item.description: I haven’t been posting lately. And it’s entirely your fault. Naturally I’m going to blame you and absolutely anything or anyone else but myself, because of the kind of blight that seeps from your personality like a derelict, sunken ship. So please allow me to try and paint that glorious picture, that honed nautical possession of fluctuating visual image, which I’m sure you’ll prize more than the explicitly gorgeous Mona Lisa.
